page.content:
Want to get involved with the operation of CJUR? We have opportunities for individuals of all career levels. Check out the position descriptions for more information and how to apply. All applications are sent to info@cjur.ca.

Undergraduate Students

Submissions to our journals are received by senior undergraduate editors who assess if submissions are suitable for publication and pass them off to appropriate reviewers for technical feedback. Hiring for new editors is done every April-May through the Undergraduate Research Opportunities (URO) Club at UBC. More information about URO can be found here.

Position Description

Graduate Students

We are recruiting graduate students from all academic disciplines to act as reviewers of our journal and provide feedback to our authors. This is a great opportunity to gain editorial experience!

Position Description
page.title: Get involved
